name: AV Living Lab d.o.o.
membership:
Member of GIZ ACS, Automotive Cluster of Slovenia
http://www.acs-giz.si/
memberOrga: Our parent company is BTC d.d. http://www.btc.si/en/
goal:
The AV Living Lab acts as a catalyst and a world-class epicenter for connected Autonomous Vehicle development for Level 4 and Level 5 solutions and scenarios in a stimuli-rich, dense, diverse, and rapid machine learning 24/7 real-life environment. With a high number of daily visitors in a real-life environment, we are solving one of the key issues in today’s development and innovation process – rapid prototyping, testing, and validating. We provide an environment for “technology readiness level” from 3 to 8 (TRL3-TRL8) related testing, capable and open to endless possibilities for innovation throughout our growing ecosystem.
AV Living Lab is a author of the University of Things concept.
interests: Communication, Development, Energy, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: AV Living Lab is directly or indirectly involved in the following topics: Regulation and practices, regarding connected and autonomous vehicles; Regulation and practices, regarding smart road infrastructure; Regulation and practices, regarding smart cities; Electromobility; EU Framework "Circular Economy"; Horizon2020, CEF; EU Framework for Automated Driving; Intelligent Transport Systems (ITS), automated and connected driving; e-Privacy Regulation; 5G implementation; AI and Blockchain initiatives and regulation; General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Implementation; Cyber Security Strategy; European Research & Innovation policy; TEN-T Days 2018 participation;
